name: unsalaried
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
working without payment, or done for no payment: All of the organization's officers are unsalaried and give their time on a voluntary basis. She was paid briefly and then had a temporary, unsalaried position.
paid for particular pieces of work, rather than being paid a regular fixed amount as an employee: The change would affect salaried as well as unsalaried employees. He taught for fifteen years as an unsalaried lecturer.
More examplesFewer examplesHer father is an unsalaried Baptist minister.Most of their fire and emergency medical squads were staffed by unsalaried volunteers. The board has seven members, who each serve an unsalaried five-year term.I was offered an unsalaried post.His position is unsalaried.
